refnamediv.refpurpose: Makes an HTTP request over the specified connection

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public bool EventHttpConnection::makeRequest
EventHttpRequest req
int type
string uri
Makes an HTTP request over the specified connection. type is one of EventHttpRequest::CMD_* constants.

&reftitle.parameters;
req
The connection object over which to send the request.
type
One of
EventHttpRequest::CMD_* constants .
uri
The URI associated with the request.
